Allah tʿālyā chuh tohyhi vrathtuk ḥkum frmavan tuhndyn avladn hndi ḥqh. Kus kithh pạtthụ̄ krivratht mnzh pnun ḥṣh ḥạṣil, akis mrdh sund ḥṣh chuh don znann hndis ḥiṣs brabr.
